DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine incidence post-operative ptosis patient undergoing vitreoretinal surgery . An additional purpose identify pre-operative intra-operative factor correlate development post-operative ptosis vitreoretinal surgery case .
DOC.brief_title: Preoperative Intraoperative Factors Related Development Ptosis After Retinal Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate patient undergo vitreoretinal surgery UCSF Medical Center San Francisco General Hospital . After informed consent obtain , measurement eyelid parameter levator function , palpebral fissure height , upper eyelid crease height , MRD1 MRD2 collect pre-operative post-operative follow visit . External eye photograph take visit evaluate masked reader calculate eyelid parameter . Dermographic data intraoperative factor operative time type procedure collect . For statistical analysis , Repeated ANOVA , Paired t-test , Wilcoxon sign rank test , Chi-square test Pearson 's correlation analysis calculate SPSS software .
DOC.criteria: Patients vitreoretinal surgery January 2013 Minors , young age 18 . Patients preexist ptosis baseline operative eye . Patients able cooperate eyelid ptosis measurement
